Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 isravel Puththirarukkul Manidharilum Mirugajeevangalilum Karppandhirandhu Pirakkira Mudhalperanaiththaiyum Enakkup Parisuththappaduththu; Adhu Ennudaiyadhu Endraar.

3 appozhudhu Mose Janangalai Nokki: Neengal Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Indha Naalai Ninaiyungal; Karththar Balaththa Kaiyinaal Ungalai Avvidaththilirundhu Purappadappanninaar; Aagaiyaal, Neengal Puliththa Appam Pusikkavendaam.
4 aapip Maadhaththin Indha Naalile Neengal Purappatteergal.

5 aagaiyaal, Karththar Unakkuk Koduppen Endru Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittadhum, Paalum Thenum Odugiradhumaana Dhesamaagiya Kaanaaniyar, Eththiyar, Emoriyar, Eviyar, Eboosiyar Enbavargaludaiya Dhesaththukku Unnai Varappannum Kaalaththil, Nee Indha Maadhaththile Indha Aaraadhanaiyaich Seyvaayaaga.
6 pulippillaa Appaththai Ezhunaalalavum Pusikkakkadavaai; Ezhaamnaalile Karththarukkup Pandikai Aasarikkappaduvadhaaga.
7 andha Ezhunaalum Pulippillaa Appam Pusikkavendum; Pulippulla Appam Unnidaththile Kaanappadavendaam; Un Ellaikkul Engum Puliththamaavum Unnidaththil Kaanappadavendaam.
8 annaalil Nee Un Puththiranai Nokki: Naan Egipthilirundhu Purappadugaiyil, Karththar Enakkuch Seydhadharkaaga Ippadi Nadappikkappadugiradhu Endru Sol.

9 karththarin Niyaayappiramaanam Unvaayilirukkumbadikku, Idhu Un Kaiyile Oru Adaiyaalamaagavum Un Kangalin Naduve Ninaippoottudhalaagavum Irukkakkadavadhu; Balaththa Kaiyinaal Karththar Unnai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar;
10 aagaiyaal, Nee Varushandhorum Kuriththa Kaalaththil Indha Niyamaththai Aasariththu Varuvaayaaga.
11 melum, Karththar Unakkum Un Pidhaakkalukkum Aanaiyittapadiye, Unnaik Kaanaaniyarin Dhesaththile Varappanni, Adhai Unakkuk Kodukkumpodhu,
12 karppanthirandhu Pirakkum Anaiththaiyum, Unakku Irukkum Mirugajeevangalin Thalaiyeetranaiththaiyum, Karththarukku Oppukkoduppaayaaga; Avaigalilulla Aangal Karththarudaiyavaigal.
13 kazhudhaiyin Thalaiyeetraiyellaam Oru Aattukkuttiyaal Meettukkolvaayaaga; Meetkaavittaal, Adhin Kazhuththai Muriththuppodu. Un Pillaigalil Mudhalperaana Sagala Narajeevanaiyum Meettuk Kolvaayaaga.
14 pirkaalaththil Un Kumaaran: Idhu Enna Endru Unnaik Kettaal; Nee Avanai Nokki: Karththar Engalaip Balaththa Kaiyinaal Adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar.

15 engalai Vidaadhabadikku, Paarvon Kadinappattirukkumpodhu, Karththar Egipthu Dhesaththil Manidharin Thalaippillaigalmudhal Mirugajeevangalin Thalaiyeetrugal Varaikkum Undaayirundha Mudhalperugal Yaavaiyum Kondru Pottaar; Aagaiyaal, Karppandhirandhu Pirakkum Aanaiyellaam Naan Karththarukkup Baliyittu En Pillaigalil Mudhalperanaiththaiyum Meettukkollugiren.

16 karththar Engalaip Balaththa Kaiyinaal Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninadharku, Idhu Un Kaiyil Adaiyaalamaagavum, Un Kangalin Naduve Gnaabagakkuriyaagavum Irukkakkadavadhu Endru Solvaayaaga Endraan.

17 paarvon Janangalaip Poga Vittapin: Janangal Yuththaththaik Kandaal Manamadindhu, Egipthukkuth Thirumbuvaargal Endru Solli; Pelistharin Dhesavazhiyaaip Povadhu Sameebamaanaalum, Dhevan Avargalai Andha Vazhiyaai Nadaththaamal,
18 sivandha Samuththiraththin Vanaandhara Vazhiyaai Janangalaich Chutrip Pogappanninaar. Isravel Puththirar Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Aniyaniyaaip Purappattupponaargal.

19 mose Thannodekooda Yoseppin Elumbugalai Eduththukkondu Ponaan. Dhevan Nichchayamaai Ungalaich Sandhippaar; Appozhudhu Ungalodekooda En Elumbugalai Ivvidaththilirundhu Kondupongal Endru Yoseppu Solli, Isravel Puththirarai Urudhiyaai Aanaiyidumbadi Seydhirundhaan.
20 avargal Sukkoththilirundhu Pirayaanappattu, Vanaandharaththin Oramaai Eththaamile Paalayamiranginaargal.

21 avargal Iravum Pagalum Vazhinadakkakkoodumbadikku, Karththar Pagalil Avargalai Vazhinadaththa Megasthambaththilum, Iravil Avargalukku Velichchamkaatta Akkinisthambaththilum Avargalukku Mun Sendraar.
22 pagalile Megasthambamum, Iravile Akkinisthambamum Janangalidaththilirundhu Vilagippogavillai.
